The dog may become stressed or anxious during the competition, leading to aggressive behavior towards other dogs or people.
The trainer may not have the necessary skills or experience to properly train the dog, leading to mistakes in the training process.
The dog may become overly excited or agitated during the competition, causing it to make mistakes or behave unpredictably.
The dog may not be able to perform the required tricks or tasks as required by the competition rules, leading to disqualification.
The dog may become injured or ill during the competition, causing it to be unable to participate.
